description:
A fun activity to play with your team! It's time to play GUESSSSSK, GUESS THE DESK.


  • Create a character card
  • Every hour starts a new round with a new desk picture of a colleague
  • Drag your character card to the voting area of the person who owns this desk
  • The first round starts at 10:00


Thanks to Kelsey O'Neill (@GravityWorks) for the illustration and monster parts!!
